title: Global Document Management Systems Market 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/28/2015 @ 2:29 PM Companies mentioned in this article: ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About document management systemDocument management systems (DMS) enable organizations to manage tasks effectively and streamline processing of their documents across all departments. From unstructured content to structured documentation, DMS includes every action taken with respect to creation, distribution, and deletion of documents. It helps centralise unorganized documents. Unorganized content makes it difficult for large organizations to use the available data and extract business related information. DMS manages the consistency of documents and protects documents from unauthorised use.Technavio's analysts forecast the global document management systems market to grow at a CAGR of 14.28% over the period 2014-2019. Covered in this Report This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global DMS market for the period 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, it considers revenue generated through the following:- Software licenses and subscription costs- Software implementation and maintenance costsThe report covers segmentation of the market by deployment. The modes of deployment include:- Cloud-based DMS- On-premises DMSThe report also presents the vendor landscape and a corresponding detailed analysis of the four leading vendors in the market. In addition, it discusses the major drivers that influence the growth of the market. It also outlines the challenges faced by vendors and the market at large, as well as the key trends emerging in the market.Key regions
